awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Estimation in Multivariate Analysis  and Related Topics
awd_abstract_narration: The research involves the estimation of the covariance                     matrix of a multivariate normal distribution and using the basic                approach to treat some related problems.  The estimators of the                 covariance matrix are formal Bayes and orthogonally invariant, so               the focus is on estimating the eigenvalues subject to the natural               order.  The formal marginal densities that determine the                        estimators will be developed.  In addition the methods may be                   applied to the problem of estimating the mean vector when the                   components satisfy order relations.  These estimators will be                   compared with the classical isotonic regression.  Furthermore a                 problem in quadratic discrimination will be examined which                      originates from an application in ophthalmology.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
